# costory_service_account (Data Source)

Returns Costory service-account data from the Costory API.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "costory" {
  token = var.costory_token
}

data "costory_service_account" "current" {}

output "service_account" {
  value = data.costory_service_account.current.service_account
}

output "sub_ids" {
  value = data.costory_service_account.current.sub_ids
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `service_account` (String) Service account name returned by Costory.
- `sub_ids` (List of String) Subscription IDs returned by Costory.
